root.name: z

example.code: v = PVector(20.0, 30.0, 40.0) print(v.x) # Prints "20.0" print(v.y) # Prints "30.0" print(v.z) # Prints "40.0" v.z = 50.0 print(v.z) # Prints "50.0"

root.description: The z component of the vector. This field (variable) can be used to both get and set the value (see above example.)
